channel.title: Youtube license & monetization
channel.description: I am a YouTube video creator and I'm planning on making "Let's Play" (commentated gameplay) videos of the Black Mesa mod once it is released. I would like to know if it's possible to obtain a license for world wide commercial use of audio & video capture/recordings of this mod. The reason: YouTube monetization (i.e. placing advertisements on the video) requires a commercial license. Thanks for your time.

item.title: Youtube license & monetization
item.dc:creator: Yellowbear
item.description:
I am a YouTube video creator and I’m planning on making “Let’s Play” (commentated gameplay) videos of the Black Mesa mod once it is released.
I would like to know if it’s possible to obtain a license for world wide commercial use of audio & video capture/recordings of this mod.
The reason: YouTube monetization (i.e. placing advertisements on the video) requires a commercial license.
Thanks for your time.

Read full topic
